singleton_with_instance: You can have only one installation of __module_title__. If you want to reinstall or uninstall this app go to Active Apps.
jamesbox_update_manuel_restart: Restart is not supported. Please replug the power supply for 5 seconds or press the hardware reset button (see user manual) to force a POPP Hub restart.
error_license_request: Unable to load a license key from the remote server.
ie_edge_not_supported: Sorry, but SmartHome does not support Internet explorer and Edge. Please use Firefox, Chrome, Safari or Opera.
upload_allowed_formats: The uploaded file must be in one of the following formats: __extensions__
upload_allowed_size: The uploaded file must be smaller than __size__.
upload_file_info: The uploaded file must be smaller than __size__ and in one of the following formats: __extensions__.
image_recommended_dimension: The recommended dimension of the images is __dimension__ px.
connection_refused_info: Please check your ethernet connection and the power supply of your gateway. Try to reload the page after some minutes to get back to the Smart Home UI.
jamesbox_connection_refused: Please wait, the update is in progress ...
jamesbox_connection_refused_info: __reload_begintag__ Try to reload the page after some minutes to get back to the Smart Home UI.__reload_endtag__ __attention_begintag__ ATTENTION: Please don't remove the power supply during the update. __attention_endtag__
jamesbox_update_2: The firmware will be upgraded automatically during the restart.
jamesbox_update_3: The update will take about 5 - 10 minutes. In this time the Smart Home UI won't be reachable.
jamesbox_update_attention: ATTENTION: Please don't remove the power supply of the POPP Hub as long the update is in progress. This could lead to irreparable damage on the hard- and software.
jamesbox_update_follow_steps: Please obey the following steps to upgrade the firmware of your POPP Hub:
jamesbox_current_firmware: Your current firmware is __currentfw__. There is a new firmware available. Would you like to update your gateway firmware to version __newfw__?
jamesbox_update_exists: You've already confirmed the update. Please replug the power supply for 5 seconds or press the hardware reset button (see user manual) to force a POPP Hub restart.
no_events: Sorry, there are no events to show.
hide_element_info: Only hide this element in any View
deactivate_element_info: This element can not be used for any scene, app, module and is fully deactivated
no_device_installed: There is no device installed yet
can_add_app: You can add an app in the section
can_include_device: You can include a device in the section
app_average_scored: The average number of points scored
info_missing_licence: Please apply your License or buy one if you dont have any license for this device.
how_to_resolve_zwave_errors:
Please check
1.) if the controller is plugged in correctly,
2.) that in the app 'Z-Wave Network Access' the right port is entered
(UZB: '/dev/ttyACM0', Box: '/dev/ttyAMA0', UZB-Windows: '\\\\.\\COM3', Z-Stick: '/dev/ttyUSB0', embedded boxes: '/dev/ttyS0' or '/dev/ttyS1')
3.) the app is aktiv. If not you could activate it under Menu > Apps > Active or add a new one under Menu > Apps > Local.
The Setting 'Expert View' needs to be active under Menu > My Settings.
error_remote_access_init: Can't intialize remote access data. Please deactivate/activate it in Apps-Active tab.
configuration_cancel: The auto-configuration of the device (Z-Wave Interview) did not complete. You may not have  all device functions available. You should reset the device and redo the inclusion process.
error_exclusion_time: EXCLUSION takes a long time to start up.
error_inclusion_time: INCLUSION takes a long time to start up.
error_zwave_network: An unexpected error occurred while initialising the Z-Wave controller data.
error_zwave_device: An unexpected error occurred while loading the Z-Wave device.
error_interview_secure_failed: Secure Inclusion  failed. Exclude and try to include again.
error_interview_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while configuring the device.
error_interview_battery: You must to wake up the device to complete the inclusion.
factory_default_info: This will remove all already installed or updated apps, devices, settings etc.
factory_default_war: Are you sure you want to reset all to default factory settings?
nonunique_user: 用户名已使用，请使用不同用户名登陆.
nonunique_email: 邮箱已被使用，请使用不同的邮箱.
password_email_info: 请提供邮箱地址以便找回密码时使用.
management_trans_info: 这个翻译由泰家宝控制系统有限公司 www.tkbhome.com 和 Z_Wave.Me http://www.zwave.me提供，联系请发邮件至 info@zwave.me
bugreport_info: 这个表格主要用于报告UI上存在的漏洞，请不要回复，若需要帮助或咨询，请联系上面提供的邮箱
password_forgot_info: 输入注册时邮箱重置密码.
password_forgot_success: 请进入您的邮箱重置密码.
token_notfound: 输入密钥系统中不存在
remove_device_from_network: 您想移除并重置您的Z-Wave网络?
start_removal: 请点击以下按钮开始移除和重置.
confirm_exclusion: 请确认设备从网络中移除。您可能需要查询产品使用说明书来了解如何删除或者移除设备，这可能使产品恢复出厂设置.
broken_device_war: 请仅在设备损坏或者不能使用时使用此功能，它将会删除设备，但不是重置，所以它不能再加入其它网络.
broken_device_info: 接入设备的无线连接已经测试，可能持续几分钟时间。如果设备可用它将不会从网络中删除，请使用上面提到删除和重置步骤设置.
password_valid: 密码最少由6个字符组成
password_info: 您使用的是默认密码，这非常不安全，建议马上更改密码.
app_installation_successful_but_restart_: 软件安装成功，请重启主机 Raspberry.
app_update_confirm: 软件升级后可能不能使用，请先从"Active"删除设备然后重新安装，确定升级软件?
app_update_successful_but_restart_necess: 软件更新成功，请重启主机 Raspberry
app_delete_successful_but_restart_necess: 成功软件删除，请重启主机Raspberry
app_reset_confirm: 所有相关软件将被删除
welcome_step2: 从列表中选择一个设备，按齿轮状图标
welcome_step3: 在设置窗口选择 "添加到界面中"
backup_info: A backup file will be created that includes all custom configurations, downloaded apps and Z-Wave controller data. You should store this on your computer. A completely reseted controller couldn't be restored with this backup. Please use the backup / restore functionality from the ExpertUI under Network > Controller instead.
device_exists: 设备已经存在，卸载然后重新安装.
enocean_no_settings: 该设备备没有配置选项
room_image_upload_info: 上传图片必须小于600KB，支持IPEG,GIP格式，推荐上传图片尺寸200 x 200像素.
keep_password_empty: 如果不想更改密码请空着
firmware_update_info: 将打开心的窗口，升级程序，点击“高级”->程序，依照说明进行.
factory_default_success: 系统成功返回到出厂设置.
factory_default_error: 系统不能返回到出厂设置.
are_you_sure_restore: 确定要覆盖网络配置，是否已经备份? Notice: A completely reseted controller cannot be restored by this .zab-backup-file. Please use the backup / restore functionality from the ExpertUI under Network > Controller instead. Activate 'Also restore network topology information (please read the user manual first!)' during restore. (not recommended)
restore_backup_chip: 同时保存网络拓扑信息 (请先阅读使用说明书!)
enocean_not_active: EnOcean模块未激活，请在软件->激活操作.
inclusion_proces_done: 新设备被找到并且可以使用
inclusion_error: 添加设备出现故障，请重新操作.
events_hidden: 一些事件被隐藏，可以从“我的设置”中更改
email_invalid: 请添加有效的邮箱地址
remote_access_not_active: 远程访问管理未激活，请操作“软件->激活”.
remote_access_not_installed: 远程访问管理未安装，请添加新的“远程访问”，按步骤（软件>当地>远程访问>添加新软件）.
inclusion_interview_not_complete: 设备找到但是配置不完全
error_403: 403 Forbidden. 你没有权限访问该页面!
error_404: 404 Not Found. 请求数据不存在
remote_access_warning: 请记住，你需要用不同的方式在网络中找到你的Z-Box，因为popp.zwave.me 的指导服务可能终止.
redirect_to_expert: 将被重新切换至高级设置界面
welcome_2: 可以用登录名: "admin" 和密码: "admin"
welcome_3: 请不要忘记在"我的设置" 中修改密码
error_module_delete_active: 无法删除模块。模块仍在使用中。
conf_apply_battery: 要先唤醒电池供电设备，才能更改其设置
lb_local: 本地用户Local User (允许通过本地主机/ 127.0.0.1)
error_load_user: 未找到用户，请核对用户名和密码
lb_include_preparation: 设备需要处于出厂默认状态。如果你不确认是否处于此状态，请运行
lb_inclusion_info: 添加设备过程可以将新的设备加入到Z-Wave网络中。请确认设备处于出厂默认状态，否则添加操作会失败。如果你不确定是否处于出厂默认状态，请参考用户手册将设备恢复至出厂默认状态，或者先进行移除操作。
lb_new_device_found: 发现新设备。请等待完成新设备的配置。
lb_new_device_configured: 已完成新设备配置，准备使用。新设备名为
lb_include_device_mains_error: 添加过程出错，请移除设备后重复该过程
lb_include_device_battery_error: 无法完成添加过程。设备可能已进入睡眠状态，请将其唤醒后完成配置。
lb_no_module: 模块不存在或参数无效
lb_add_dashboard_confirm: 这意味着你将无法再使用该元素。确定么？
lb_permanently_hide_con: 这意味着你将无法再使用该元素。确认么？
lb_alerts_tt: 这些事件由安全管理的相关传感器应用建立，如烟感，门磁等...
